Elements.Body: I wasn’t trying to use the family card or anything, but I have to be real with you Isaac. I bet you’ve felt the same. Your parents, your grandparents...they probably don’t know what’s up. They might not even have the Dreamweaver in their phones. So how could they know what to do?
You don’t need to bring my family up, too. I get your point.
They couldn’t. It’s terrifying, it really is.

Anyway, I just wanted you to know where I was coming from. More importantly, I finished what me and Lawrence will start putting up on the forums. Gonna give it a good read before I put it out - wanna make sure it shows up in as many places possible. After that, it’s out of our hands.

Anyway, I just wanted you to know where I was coming from. More importantly, I finished what me and Lawrence will start putting up on the forums. Gonna give it a good read before I put it out - wanna make sure it shows up in as many places possible. After that, it’s out of our hands.
You still don’t seem to have thought this through.
I follow, but what happens after that?

The point is we can let everyone be responsible for themselves and for the people around them. Look, I know that you can’t rely on everyone, there’s no doubt some would rather see a person get ripped apart by a Nightmare for the view and a story. People are fucked up. But we have to do our best to help the people who care.

The point is we can let everyone be responsible for themselves and for the people around them. Look, I know that you can’t rely on everyone, there’s no doubt some would rather see a person get ripped apart by a Nightmare for the view and a story. People are fucked up. But we have to do our best to help the people who care.
Help them, or help yourself, Rinzin? How much do you really care about what happens to a stranger?
It’s for the best, isn’t it? If we give everyone the ability we have.
